<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202748</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The French Revolution: "Those who have and those who have not"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Französische Revolution: "die, die 
haben und die, die nicht haben"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Révolution Française : "ceux qui ont et
ceux qui démuni"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A Volta Francesa: "aqueles que têm e 
aqueles que não têm"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Rivoluzione Francese: "coloro che ha e 
coloro che non ha"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η γαλλική επανάσταση: "Εκείνοι που έχουν και 
εκείνοι που δεν έχουν"</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La Revolución Francesa: "los que tienen y 
los que no tienen"</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson is part of the French Revolution unit that examines the reigns of the absolute monarchs and the monetary crisis of the French government.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion ist ein Teil der Französische 
Revolution Maßeinheit, die die Herrschaften der absoluten Monarchen 
und die Währungskrise der französischen Regierung überprüft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon fait partie de l'unité de 
révolution française qui examine les règnes des monarques absolus 
et la crise monétaire du gouvernement français.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição é parte da unidade da volta francesa
que examina os reinos dos monarchs absolutos e a crise monetary do 
governo francês.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione fa parte dell'unità di giro 
francese che esamina i regni dei monarchi assoluti e la crisi 
monetaria del governo francese.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα είναι μέρος της γαλλικής μονάδας 
επαναστάσεων που εξετάζει βασιλεύει των απόλυτων μοναρχών και της
νομισματικής κρίσης της γαλλικής κυβέρνησης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección es parte de la unidad de la 
revolución francesa que examina los reinados de los monarcas 
absolutos y la crisis monetaria del gobierno francés.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>

        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>

            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>

      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107848</entry>
